short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed by art lovers for lovers of art this extension will provide you with a pleasant backdrop to a refreshing search experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Once the extension is active you will be able to select your desired work of art as your search backdrop from our curated collection. You will also enjoy information about the current time and weather in your area and a useful widget to keep track of your tasks.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Art Tab extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab search to Microsoft Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://art.mnsdigitalmedia.com/terms-and-conditions and Privacy Policy at https://art.mnsdigitalmedia.com/privacy-policy.
